NK016(ma)016:0: gshin po rjes su 'dzin pa'i cho ga thar pa'i myur lam zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK016(ma)016:1: gshin po rjes su 'dzin pa'i cho ga thar pa'i myur lam zhes bya ba /
NK016(ma)016:2: dpal ldan bla ma ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)016:3: las nyon sgrib tshogs stug por 'khrigs pa'i mun //
NK016(ma)016:4: thugs rje'i nyi ma 'bar ba'i 'od ris kyis //
NK016(ma)016:5: mthar byas bde chen lam bzang gsal mdzad pa'i //
NK016(ma)016:6: khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' der phyag 'tshal //
NK016(ma)016:7: rdo rje theg pa'i sgor spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa
NK016(ma)016:8: ltar snang gi bya bas blo mi khrid cing 'gro
NK016(ma)016:9: la rjes su brtse ba'i gzhan dbang du gyur pa
NK016(ma)016:10: dag gis / snying rje'i yul du gyur pa'i sems
NK016(ma)016:11: can 'chi bdag gi lto bar tshud cing ngan 'gro'i
NK016(ma)016:12: 'jigs pas mnar ba de dag rjes su 'dzin pa'i
NK016(ma)016:13: thabs 'di la nan tan du bya ba yin te
NK016(ma)016:14: dag gis / / zhi khro sgyu 'phrul la sogs
NK016(ma)016:15: pa'i rten gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'du byas pa'i
NK016(ma)016:16: shar sgor pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i khar
NK016(ma)016:18: gzugs ming n+ri yig bris pa'i byang bu dri rten bcas bkod /
NK016(ma)016:19: gzhan yang sbyang chas dang zas gtad sogs nye bar
NK016(ma)016:20: mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad tshogs par byas la
NK016(ma)016:21: / gang la brten bya'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub cing mchod nas /
NK016(ma)016:22: bdag nyid 'jug pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK016(ma)016:23: cho ga dngos la dman mchog gnyis las /
NK016(ma)016:24: dang po la'ang rten bskyed pa /
NK016(ma)016:26: bgegs dang sdig pa sbyong ba /
NK016(ma)016:35: zhar byung s+aats+tsha gdab pa'i las dang bcu gsum mo //
NK016(ma)016:38: stong pa'i ngang las pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du
NK016(ma)016:39: ming byang n+ri las tshe 'das kyi gzugs kyi rnam
NK016(ma)016:40: pa ji lta bar gyur par bsam la /
NK016(ma)016:41: gnyis pa rnam shes dgug pa ni /
NK016(ma)016:43: rtsa brgyud kyi bla ma mchog gsum rgyal ba brgya
NK016(ma)016:44: mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyi bden pa dang
NK016(ma)016:45: / zhi khro sgyu 'phrul rnam par rol pa'i lha
NK016(ma)016:46: tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi bden pa dang
NK016(ma)016:47: / / gsang sngags rig sngags gzungs sngags snying po
NK016(ma)016:48: phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi bden pa dang
NK016(ma)016:49: / / / bden pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs
NK016(ma)016:50: kyis 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu song ba
NK016(ma)016:51: che ge mo'i rnam par shes pa khams gsum rigs
NK016(ma)016:52: drug gi gnas gang na gnas kyang skad cig yud
NK016(ma)016:53: tsam la 'dir mchis par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)016:55: nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu //
NK016(ma)016:56: 'tsho bar byed pa'i tshe zad cing //
NK016(ma)016:58: pha rol gnas su song ba khyod //
NK016(ma)016:59: rnam shes rten med las dbang gis //
NK016(ma)016:60: khams gsum rigs drug gar gnas kyang //
NK016(ma)016:61: lha dang bla ma dran gyis la //
NK016(ma)016:62: mos gus gdung bas 'dir shog cig /
NK016(ma)016:63: gzugs brnyan lus rten ming byang ngag /
NK016(ma)016:64: n+ri yig sems rten dri mar bcas //
NK016(ma)016:65: bag chags rten yin myur shog la //
NK016(ma)016:66: dran pa'i sems kyis gnas par gyis //
NK016(ma)016:67: n+ri badz+ra ang+ku sha dzah dzahmh'u bam hoh zhes lan
NK016(ma)016:68: gsum brjod pas rnam shes a thung gi rnam pas
NK016(ma)016:70: gsum pa sbyang chas bsham la /
NK016(ma)016:71: sarba big+h+n+aana na mah sogs gsum gyis zhi ba /
NK016(ma)016:72: ting lo bskor zhing sum+b+ha ni bzla bas phyed ma /
NK016(ma)016:73: rang nyid h'u mdzad du bsgoms nas khro bo spyan drangs mchod cing bstod /
NK016(ma)016:74: gong bzhin bden stobs brjod pa'i bden pa chen po'i
NK016(ma)016:75: byin gyi rlabs kyis tshe las 'das pa gson gyi
NK016(ma)016:76: dus su tshe la bar du gcod cing gshin gyi
NK016(ma)016:77: dus na sdig pa sbyong ba la bar du gcod
NK016(ma)016:78: pa'i bgegs tshogs thams cad gtor ma 'dis tshims par
NK016(ma)016:79: gyis la 'dir ma gnas par gzhan du dengs shig
NK016(ma)016:80: / gal te mi 'gro na khro bo ye shes
NK016(ma)016:81: kyi rdo rje me rab tu 'bar ba 'dis khyed
NK016(ma)016:82: rnams kyi mgo bo tshal ba brgyar 'gas par 'gyur
NK016(ma)016:83: / ta re / drag sngags bzla zhing yungs kar
NK016(ma)016:84: gyis brab rol mo'i sgra dang bcas te drag pos
NK016(ma)016:85: / ta re / sbyong ba'o // bzhi pa mdun du til dang me chu bsham la /
NK016(ma)016:86: tshe las 'das pa'i tshe rabs 'khor ba thog ma
NK016(ma)016:87: med pa nas bsags pa'i sdig sgrib thams cad yi
NK016(ma)016:88: ge kam nag po'i rnam par gnas pa lte ba'i
NK016(ma)016:89: gtum mo ye shes kyi mes ded /
NK016(ma)016:90: sna sgor sdig pa rwa can gyi rnam pas thon
NK016(ma)016:91: nas mdun gyi til la thim pa de nyid ye
NK016(ma)016:92: shes kyi mes bsregs shing chos nyid kyi rgya mtshor
NK016(ma)016:93: dor bar gyur / sarba p+aa pam sogs brjod cing g.yas su mer bsregs g.yon du chur blug /
NK016(ma)016:94: tshe las 'das pas 'khor ba thog ma med pa
NK016(ma)016:95: nas bsags pa'i sdig sgrib thams cad sh+ain+tam ku ru
NK016(ma)016:96: s+w+aa h+aa / zhes brjod cing rol mo dang bcas pas phyir dor /
NK016(ma)016:97: de nas yig brgya dang ngan song sbyong ba'i gzungs
NK016(ma)016:98: bzlas pa'i bye mas rten la brab cing reg pa
NK016(ma)016:99: tsam gyis sdig sgrib thams cad ba mo la nyi
NK016(ma)016:100: ma shar ba bzhin dag par bsam mo //
NK016(ma)016:101: lnga pa me long du dkyil 'khor pa'i snang brnyan 'char bar khrus gsol zhing /
NK016(ma)016:102: rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs mchog la //
NK016(ma)016:103: nyon mongs sgrib pa mi mnga' yang //
NK016(ma)016:104: tshe 'das sgo gsum sgrib sbyang phyir //
NK016(ma)016:105: gtsang ma'i chab kyis khrus gsol lo //
NK016(ma)016:106: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi she ka ta sa ma ya sh+r+ai ye h'u /
NK016(ma)016:107: de dag sku la mtshungs pa med pa'i gos //
NK016(ma)016:108: gtsang la dri rab bgos pas sku phyi'o //
NK016(ma)016:109: h'u t+r+aam h+r+aih+aah k+aa ya bi shwa d+ha ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK016(ma)016:111: khrus chu de nyid bum par blugs pas ming byang bkru zhing /
NK016(ma)016:112: rnam dag gtsang dwangs lha yi chu //
NK016(ma)016:114: phyag rgya ye shes bu ma pa'i chus //
NK016(ma)016:115: tshe 'das sgrib pa dag gyur cig /
NK016(ma)016:116: yi ge brgya ba brjod cing bkru /
NK016(ma)016:118: 'di ni sbyin pa'i rang bzhin chu //
NK016(ma)016:119: sogs phar phyin drug gi khrus sngags tshigs rol mo bcas pas bkru /
NK016(ma)016:120: drug pa ku shas rten la byabs shing /
NK016(ma)016:121: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum //
NK016(ma)016:123: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dug mi mnga' //
NK016(ma)016:124: sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcom mo //
NK016(ma)016:125: de bzhin du chos dang dge 'dun la yang sbyar ro //
NK016(ma)016:126: de nas 'byung ba so sos byabs shing /
NK016(ma)016:127: sa ni dug gi pha yin te //
NK016(ma)016:128: sa ni dug gi ma yang yin //
NK016(ma)016:129: sangs rgyas spyan ma'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK016(ma)016:130: tshe 'das khyod la dug med shog /
NK016(ma)016:134: rlung dam tshig sgrol ma'i zhes sbyar /
NK016(ma)016:135: rigs drug gnas sbyong byed par spro na zur du bris pa bzhin 'dir sbyar ro //
NK016(ma)016:137: tshe 'das nyid dkyil 'khor gyi lha la phyag 'tshal
NK016(ma)016:138: zhing skyabs su 'gro bar bsam zhing tshig rnams brjod
NK016(ma)016:139: par mos la / phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang //
NK016(ma)016:140: mchog gsum zhi khro rab 'byams kyi //
NK016(ma)016:141: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad la //
NK016(ma)016:142: de ring snying nas bdag skyabs mchi //
NK016(ma)016:143: mgon po thugs rje can rnams kyis //
NK016(ma)016:144: 'khor ba'i sems can bdag lta bu //
NK016(ma)016:145: bar do'i gnas na mgon med cing //
NK016(ma)016:146: 'jigs pas mnar ba bdag la dgongs //
NK016(ma)016:147: thog med dus nas spyad pa yi //
NK016(ma)016:148: las ngan sgrib pas bcings pa bdag /
NK016(ma)016:149: mtha' med 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las //
NK016(ma)016:150: bde chen gnas su drang du gsol //
NK016(ma)016:153: nyon mongs gdung bas gzir ba rnams //
NK016(ma)016:154: byams pa'i thugs rjes skyob tu gsol //
NK016(ma)016:156: brgyad pa dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa nas bzung gtang
NK016(ma)016:157: rag gi mthar thug par slob ma la ji ltar
NK016(ma)016:160: tshe 'das skad cig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bskyed pa'i mdun du bza' btung sna tshogs bsham /
NK016(ma)016:161: ram yam kham gis bsregs gtor bkrus /
NK016(ma)016:162: 'dod yon gyi phung po zad mi shes pas nam mkha' gang bar bsam la /
NK016(ma)016:163: nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas /
NK016(ma)016:165: nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje sems //
NK016(ma)016:166: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
NK016(ma)016:168: 'dod pa thams cad tshim byed pa //
NK016(ma)016:169: bcud chen ro mchog brgya ldan pa'i //
NK016(ma)016:170: bza' dang btung ba'i tshogs rnams dang //
NK016(ma)016:172: khyod kyi re ba bskang bar bya //
NK016(ma)016:173: khyad par brtse gdung gnyen rnams kyis //
NK016(ma)016:174: gdung ba'i skad kyis khyod bos nas //
NK016(ma)016:175: 'dod yon bza' bca' btung ba'i tshogs //
NK016(ma)016:176: ting 'dzin sngags rgyas sbar te bsngo //
NK016(ma)016:177: dga' dang spro ba'i sems kyis ni //
NK016(ma)016:178: zhen pa med par longs spyod cig /
NK016(ma)016:179: bkres skom gdung ba kun zhi nas //
NK016(ma)016:180: 'dod yon dpal la spyod par shog /
NK016(ma)016:182: des bdag gir bzung nas dkyil 'khor pa mchod par bltas la tshogs mchod bya /
NK016(ma)016:184: nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu //
NK016(ma)016:185: rigs drug gnas na bde ba med //
NK016(ma)016:186: sdug bsngal las la ma chags par //
NK016(ma)016:187: ma yengs rtse gcig dran bas zungs //
NK016(ma)016:188: 'khor bar ma chags par gdams pa'o //
NK016(ma)016:189: 'og min chos dbyings zhing khams na //
NK016(ma)016:190: bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs //
NK016(ma)016:191: gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings su //
NK016(ma)016:192: rang rig rtsal gyis 'gro bar gyis //
NK016(ma)016:194: dkon mchog bden pa'i byin rlabs dang //
NK016(ma)016:195: lha dang snying po phyag rgya'i mthus //
NK016(ma)016:196: lam lnga sa bcu skad cig la //
NK016(ma)016:197: thog pa med par bgrod gyur cig /
NK016(ma)016:200: tshe 'das kyi rnam shes a thung gi rnam par
NK016(ma)016:201: spyi bo nas thon 'og min gyi zhing du song
NK016(ma)016:202: ste rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kar thim par bsam
NK016(ma)016:204: rnam shes gshegs pa'i byang bu sdig sgrib dang mnyam du ye shes kyi mes bsregs par bsam la /
NK016(ma)016:206: chos kyi dbyings kyi thab khung du //
NK016(ma)016:207: bdag 'dzin phung po'i bud shing la //
NK016(ma)016:208: shes rab ye shes me sbar te //
NK016(ma)016:209: tshe 'das nyon mongs bag chags sreg /
NK016(ma)016:211: gnas med mtshan ma med pa'i me //
NK016(ma)016:212: 'di ni rang byung ye shes me //
NK016(ma)016:213: bdag 'dzin mtshan ma'i rtog pa sreg /
NK016(ma)016:214: don la bsreg bya sreg byed kun //
NK016(ma)016:215: bya rtsol med par ye sangs rgyas //
NK016(ma)016:216: 'bad med lhun grub chos kyi sku //
NK016(ma)016:217: rang byung ye shes der snang ngo //
NK016(ma)016:221: rus bu'am byang ro'i steng du a dkar po 'od
NK016(ma)016:222: zer 'phros pa de las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi
NK016(ma)016:223: babs pas sdig sgrib thams cad sbyangs par bsam la
NK016(ma)016:224: / yig brgya bzla zhing dri'i chus sbyangs /
NK016(ma)016:225: des sbrus pa'i 'jim pa bsang sbyang /
NK016(ma)016:226: stong pa'i ngang las pad zla'i steng du b+h+r+aum las rin po che'i phung por gyur /
NK016(ma)016:227: rnam snang gi thugs ka nas ye shes pa 'od zer gyi rnam par bkug /
NK016(ma)016:228: 'jim par thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gyur /
NK016(ma)016:231: badz+ra a yu she s+w+aa h+aa /
NK016(ma)016:233: badz+roda b+ha wa ya s+w+aa h+aas 'bi 'bi bya /
NK016(ma)016:234: a ra dze bi ra dze s+w+aa h+aa /
NK016(ma)016:236: d+harma d+h+aa tu gar+b+he s+w+aa h+aa /
NK016(ma)016:238: badz+ra murga te a ko ta ya h'u gis brdung /
NK016(ma)016:243: su pra tish+tha badz+re s+w+aa h+aas bzhugs su gsol /
NK016(ma)016:244: de nyid rnam snang du skyed la ye shes pa dgug cing bstim /
NK016(ma)016:245: mchod cing bstod de rang gzugs su bsgyur nas me tog 'thor zhing brtan zhugs bya'o //
NK016(ma)016:247: pur 'khor los sgyur ba'i chas su bcug /
NK016(ma)016:248: bsang sbyang dam tshig gi lhar bskyed /
NK016(ma)016:249: bden stobs kyis ye shes pa spyan drangs /
NK016(ma)016:250: khrus gsol dang mchod bstod ci rigs bya /
NK016(ma)016:251: tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod nas dbang blang ba rnams khyad par ro //
NK016(ma)016:252: de nas tshogs kyi dga' ston bya zhing gtor ma btang /
NK016(ma)016:253: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mchod cing bstod nas nongs pa bshags /
NK016(ma)016:254: ye shes pa gshegs shing dam tshig ba bdag la bsdu /
NK016(ma)016:255: dge ba bsngo zhing bkra shis bde legs su bya ba rnams so so'i nges pa bzhin bya'o //
NK016(ma)016:257: las kyi sgrib pa sbyong ba'i thabs kyi mchog /
NK016(ma)016:258: gang 'di'i tshul las yin zhes de yi phyir //
NK016(ma)016:259: rgyud gzhung chu gter grub pa'i zhal lung gis //
NK016(ma)016:260: bsrubs las sngon med nyi ma 'di na 'bar //
NK016(ma)016:261: ngan song gdung ba'i mun rum brnag dka' ba //
NK016(ma)016:262: kun bsal rnams grol thar ba'i zhing rgya mtsho //
NK016(ma)016:263: mngon du snang byed myur lam gsar ba 'dis //
NK016(ma)016:264: phan bde'i 'dab stong grol ba gcig car byas //
NK016(ma)016:265: e ma 'di 'dra'i sgyu thabs ngo mtshar 'phrul //
NK016(ma)016:266: srid par 'phyan pa'i 'jigs tshogs bzod daka'i dbal //
NK016(ma)016:267: snying rje'i chags pas bcom nas sgrib bral gyi //
NK016(ma)016:268: dga' ston mchog 'dod bde chen gsal ba byung //
NK016(ma)016:269: de tshul kun rmongs mun pa'i khang bu ru //
NK016(ma)016:270: rang bzo'i rtog pas bris min rgyud gzhung gi //
NK016(ma)016:271: legs bshad zla ba'i 'dzum dkar gyis bsus pas //
NK016(ma)016:272: blo gros kun+da'i lang tsho ci yang bzhad //
NK016(ma)016:273: gang 'di bgyis mthus 'khor mtsho sdug bsngal gyi //
NK016(ma)016:274: rlabs phreng ma dag grong khyer 'dzin bsgral nas //
NK016(ma)016:275: rnam grol thar pa'i zhing gi dga' ston la //
NK016(ma)016:276: sbyor ba'i lam bzang gru gzings nyid gyur cig /
NK016(ma)016:277: gshin po rjes su 'dzin pa'i cho ga thar pa'i myur lam zhes bya ba 'di ni /
NK016(ma)016:278: snying rje'i yul du gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'chi bdag
NK016(ma)016:279: gi lto bar tshud cing ngan song gi 'jigs pas
NK016(ma)016:280: mnar ba rnams la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas rgyu
NK016(ma)016:281: byas / tshul 'di nyid la brnag pa'i don gnyer can mang pos bskul ba rkyen du gyur te /
NK016(ma)016:282: sh+aakya'i dge bsnyen rig pa 'dzin pa 'gyur med rdo
NK016(ma)016:283: rjes bag yod kyi lo la yongs 'du'i rgyal khab
NK016(ma)016:284: chen po ri bo gru 'dzin gyi pho brang chen
NK016(ma)016:285: por sbyar ba'i yi ge ba ni 'dul 'dzin ngag
NK016(ma)016:286: dbang bzod pa'o // 'dis sems can thams cad rnam
NK016(ma)016:287: par grol ba'i byang chub kyi grong du 'jug pa'i
